Name: Strawberry Smoothie (Alcoholic)
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Fraise des Bois liqueur
Instructions: BLEND ingredients with 12oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve immediately with straws.
Review: This radiantly coloured creamy strawberry yoghurt drink is sweetened with honey and 'hardened' with vodka.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
